description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Mark of the Storm</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
levelupDescription: You've summoned the same ally 5+ times this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've summoned the same ally 5+ times this game.
flavorText: Kennen had heard it too, the roar of some unseen... something. Man or monster, it did not matter. The Kinkou would protect their land at any cost.
name: Kennen

description: When allies attack, spend 1 spell mana to summon an attacking <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Short Tooth</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When allies attack, spend 1 spell mana to summon an attacking Short Tooth.
flavorText: The Trainer's routine is the same each night. Fish 'n ale for supper, a quick puff of his bubblepipe, followed by kisses on snouts and a story for his sharks before bedtime.
name: Shark Trainer

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: If there is no greater pain than the papercut, then there is no one who better understands pain than the librarian.
name: Wizened Wizard

flavorText:
"They say don't bite the hand that feeds--but by Bandle--they bit my hand AND anything else they could reach!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Note, Day 13
name: Short Tooth

description: When I’m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, if you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+0 and Elusive.
flavorText: "What's my secret? You'll have to ask the biceps. They do all the talking."
name: Swole Scout

description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: "Okay, Plan A: We blast our way in and start shooting. If that doesn't work, we go to Plan B: Blast our way out and keep shooting. Then, we'll regroup and go to Plan C, which is basically Plan A again..."
name: Tristana

description:
Costs 2 less if you have a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tristana</style></link> or if you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tristana</style></link> in your deck. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Costs 2 less if you have a Tristana or if you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
Create a Tristana in your deck.
flavorText: In every ka-blam there's a ka-boom waiting to be born.
name: Tristana's Buster Shot

description:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant me and it +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
I have +1|+0 for each multi-region ally you've summoned this game.
When you summon a multi-region ally, grant me and it +1|+0 and Impact.
flavorText: "...and whatever happens... JUST. KEEP. SHOOTING."
name: Tristana

description: To play, discard 1. Deal 2 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Deal 2 to a unit and 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Let's give 'em a show!" - Rumble
name: Electro Harpoon

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Double my Power and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Double my Power and Impact.
flavorText:
"They say I'm a joke. That I've got dirt for brains. That I'm all tremble and no quake. Well I've just got one thing to say to my opponents...  I'm gonna rock your world!" 
- Pre-match interview
name: Earthshaker

description: When I’m summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Scrappy Bomb</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, summon a Scrappy Bomb.
flavorText: Giselle was one of Professor Heimerdinger's best students until she heard of Ziggs' strange experiments down in Zaun. Then it was all "hexplosives" this and "could you recommend me for an internship" that.
name: Inventive Chemist

description: <link=vocab.Allegiance><style=Vocab>Allegiance</style></link>: Summon another Yordle follower that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Allegiance: Summon another Yordle follower that costs 3 or less.
flavorText: "Alice here holds two shots: one's a greeting, the other's a farewell. You two wanna meet?"
name: Gruff Grenadier

description: When I'm summoned, if you've dealt damage to the enemy Nexus 4+ times, grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> 4 times. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've dealt damage to the enemy Nexus 4+ times, grant me Impact 4 times.
flavorText: Chewy outside, tough and gritty center.
name: Furious Faefolk

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant me +0|+2 for each card you discarded last round, then shuffle my stats. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Round Start: Grant me +0|+2 for each card you discarded last round, then shuffle my stats.
flavorText: For obvious reasons, "paddlemarpower" never really took off as a unit of measurement.
name: Salty Spinner

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a copy of me in hand at <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in hand at Round End.
flavorText:
"A true supervillain can never have enough minions! Short little fellows who know their place, obey your every word, and always come back for further instruction."
- Excerpt from Ch. 2 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Minion

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
flavorText:
"This world will fear me. It will wear my scars for all eternity. It will ache under the weight of my power. It will shudder under the shadow of my enormity!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 1 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Veigar

description:
<link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy, then stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Veigar</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Stun an enemy, then stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
Create a Veigar in your deck.
flavorText: "Just... stay right there..." - Veigar
name: Veigar's Event Horizon

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
When you cast <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link>, it can target anything.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round Start: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Round Start: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
When you cast Darkness, it can target anything.
flavorText:
"Aha. Muaha. Ahahaha. AHAHA. AHAHAHAHAHA! MUAHAHAHA! MUAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!"
- Excerpt from Ch. 12 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Grand Overseer Veigar

flavorText: Yordles haven't quite figured out gravity yet, but then, gravity hasn't quite figured out Bandle City, either.
name: Stone Stackers

description: Refill your spell mana. Give an ally <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> and +1|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Refill your spell mana. Give an ally Elusive and +1|+1 this round.
flavorText:
"I SEE them enter the left shell, yet when I CHOOSE that shell, it's empty. I'm beginning to suspect this game might be rigged..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 14
name: Shell Game

description: When I'm summoned, if you've played a created card or killed a unit with a spell this game, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Bass of Burden</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've played a created card or killed a unit with a spell this game, summon a Bass of Burden.
flavorText: If Veigar needed help tipping the scales of justice, then none were better suited to the job than these two. They knew all of them. Except the mixolydian one.
name: Tenor of Terror

flavorText: "The show had already run into a number of mishaps by the third piece, when the larger of the two singers--I use the term loosely--either delved into the world of the true avant-garde, or choked on a hairball. I am, even at the time of writing, unsure which." - Max Bliff, Gatekeeper
name: Bass of Burden

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard up to 3 cards to grant allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Rumbles</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> for the first, <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> for the second, and <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> for the third.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard up to 3 cards to grant allied Rumbles everywhere Impact for the first, Quick Attack for the second, and SpellShield for the third.
flavorText:
"Annnnd that oughta do 'er."
"ERROR."
"WHAT? I just fixed that!"
"SYSTEM FAILURE IMMINENT."
"Turn it off. TURN IT OFF!"
- Rumble and Tristy
name: Rumble

description: When you deal damage to the enemy Nexus, create a random Mecha-Yordle in hand or if you have one, grant all Mecha-Yordles in hand +1|+1 and reduce their cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you deal damage to the enemy Nexus, create a random Mecha-Yordle in hand or if you have one, grant all Mecha-Yordles in hand +1|+1 and reduce their cost by 1.
flavorText: "I mean, I know Tristy's already got the flamethrower, the electro-drill, and the giant freakin' mace, but c'mon... I wasn't NOT gonna add rockets. Heh heh."
name: Rumble

description:
Grant an ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Rumble</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +2|+0 and Impact.
Create a Rumble in your deck.
flavorText: "If they ain't howlin', it ain't hot enough! Heh heh." - Rumble
name: Rumble's Flamespitter

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Cloud Stance</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Cloud Stance in hand.
flavorText: "It is from control of breath that our school's technique is derived. Just as it is from wind that a tempest is born."
name: Gust Monk

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give other attacking allies +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give other attacking allies +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "How do I do it? Screamin' matches night after night? Gargle engine oil. Five minutes in the mornin', five at night."
name: Arena Mechacaster

description: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
descriptionRaw: Grow an ally to 3|3 this round.
flavorText:
"I used to be like you–couldn't even lift a puffcap. But then, I found "Shake: by Purpleberry." It's got all the right stuff a yordle needs to go from zero to hero. So when you've had a hard workout, fuel up with 'Shake,' and become the buffest of bros, like me!" 
- Printed Advertisement
name: Purpleberry Shake

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy, then stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Stun an enemy, then stun all enemies with 2 or less Power.
flavorText: "Just... stay right there..." - Veigar
name: Event Horizon

description: Pick 1 of 3 units or spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on all copies of it.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 units or spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
name: Entrapment

description: Pick 1 of 3 spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on all copies of it.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 spells from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
name: Entrapment

description: Pick 1 of 3 units from the enemy deck and plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on all copies of it.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 3 units from the enemy deck and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on all copies of it.
flavorText: "Rule 986: Traps are NOT toys... but they sure are fun!"
name: Entrapment

description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to deal 2 to anything.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Kennen</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Recall an ally to deal 2 to anything.
Create a Kennen in your deck.
flavorText: "First the crack, then the boom!" - Kennen
name: Kennen's Lightning Rush

description: Grant an enemy Mark of the Storm. If they already have it, remove the mark to <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> and deal 2 to them instead.
descriptionRaw: Grant an enemy Mark of the Storm. If they already have it, remove the mark to Stun and deal 2 to them instead.
flavorText: The storm approaches.
name: Mark of the Storm

description: When I'm summoned, blocked, or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.cast><style=AssociatedCard>Mark of the Storm</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, blocked, or Attack: Create a Mark of the Storm in hand.
flavorText: "We are wind and thunder! We are rain and lightning! This is... TEMPEST!"
name: Kennen

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: "TICKETS! GET YER TICKETS! NOWWWW HALF OFF! Oh, biscuits, if I don't sell these tickets, the boss'll kill me... literally."
name: Arena Promoter

description: When I'm summoned, create a random 1, 2, and 3 cost follower in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random 1, 2, and 3 cost follower in hand.
flavorText: "Somebody get these freakin' hairballs off my desk!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Professor Von Mech

description: <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Deal 1 to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
levelupDescription: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.
flavorText:
"It's IMPORTANT we make a good impression. The new safety inspector is stopping by, and you know what that means!"
"No more explosions?"
"WHAT?! No! It means explode things where he can't see 'em! 'No more explosions'... are you crazy?!" - Ziggs and Otto
name: Ziggs

description:
Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

description: Deal 1 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link>' blocker and to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to Ziggs' blocker and to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Boom!" - Ziggs
name: Short Fuse

description:
Deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 1 to two enemies.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

description:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit.
Create a Ziggs in your deck.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Ziggs' Bouncing Bomb

description:
<link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 2 to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw:
Attack: Deal 2 to my blocker and the enemy Nexus.
When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText:
"We passed?! WE PASSED!"
"Heh, well, 'passed' is a strong word... but hoo-wee, if you didn't put on a heck of a show!" - Ziggs and Wilfred, Safety Inspector
name: Ziggs

description: Deal 2 to <link=card.parentRef><style=AssociatedCard>Ziggs</style></link>' blocker and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to Ziggs' blocker and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Boom!" - Ziggs
name: Short Fuse

description: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, cast it again on the same targets.
descriptionRaw: When you play a created follower, summon an exact copy. When you play a created spell, cast it again on the same targets.
flavorText: "Oh yes, she's quite the mirror master. She makes my designs look even more sublime, and with a small trick of the light, even manages to lend a certain someone a touch of much needed verticality..." - Stilted Robemaker
name: Mirror Mage

description: When I’m summoned or destroyed, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned or destroyed, Stun the strongest enemy.
flavorText: "What do you mean, 'this doesn't look safe'?" - Ziggs
name: Hexplosive Minefield

description: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit or deal 1 to two enemies.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Bouncing Bomb

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Hungry Owlcat</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
flavorText: "Gunnin' in the streets and tuckin' kiddos into sheets!"
name: Bandle Commando

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +0|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +0|+1.
flavorText:
"Poppy! Excellent execution of our latest tactic. What do you think of calling it 'Peanut Petalstorm'?"
"I, uh, kinda just hit the baddie with my hammer. Can't we just call this one 'Hammer'?"
"That's what we called the last three!" - Kip and Poppy
name: Yordle Ranger

description: Deal 1 to all enemies, then do it again.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to all enemies, then do it again.
flavorText: "Bring out... 'The Big One'!" - Ziggs
name: Mega Inferno Bomb

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +1|+1.
flavorText: Humility is a mark of heroism, but many historians would agree that Poppy is kind of pushing it.
name: Poppy

description: When I'm summoned, if you've summoned units from 4+ regions this game, grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> 4 times. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've summoned units from 4+ regions this game, grant me Impact 4 times.
flavorText: Squad goals.
name: Bandle Gunners

description:
To play, discard 1.
<link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
Manifest a Mecha-Yordle.
flavorText: "Junk. Crap. Garbage... Hey, now THIS is what I'm freakin' talkin' about!" - Rumble
name: Scrapheap

description: Deal 1 to anything and plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything and plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Haha! Bullseye!" - Teemo
name: Poison Dart

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Win the game if you've summoned units from 10 regions. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a follower from a new region in hand. Win the game if you've summoned units from 10 regions.
flavorText: Stretching an unknowable distance into the heavens above, The Bandle Tree is an impossible fixture at the heart of the city. Under its great, gnarled branches, some yordles see a beacon of hope and friendship while others see an ominous, riddle-filled monolith. All agree that to gaze upon the Bandle Tree is to glance into the soul of something very old and very powerful.
name: The Bandle Tree

description: When I'm summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Stormcloud</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a Stormcloud.
flavorText: Weaving a Stormcloud took time. Time Rissu didn't have. Her hands worked furiously as the Aberration closed in. A bit of cloud here, some lightning there. Then... CRACK! BOOM! She had done it, but would it be enough?
name: Rissu, The Silent Storm

flavorText: The Stormcloud crashed into the Aberration in a crackling tangle of mist and lightning. The beast howled as it fell to the ground, its monstrous eye rolling into the back of its head. Kennen gingerly approached through the Stormcloud's dissipating haze. The Kinkou had won, but it would be short-lived. There would always be another threat. Another monster. But they would be ready.
name: Stormcloud

description: Pick 1 of 2 non-champion cards in the enemy's hand or deck and Prank it.
descriptionRaw: Pick 1 of 2 non-champion cards in the enemy's hand or deck and Prank it.
flavorText: "Gotcha!" - Fizz
name: Prank

description: Destroy a landmark or create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a landmark or create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
flavorText: "Hang on - we're rollin'!" - Bomber Twins
name: Yordle Contraption

description: Destroy a landmark.
descriptionRaw: Destroy a landmark.
flavorText: "Hang on - we're rollin'!" - Bomber Twins
name: Yordle Contraption

description: Create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create 2 random multi-region followers in hand.
flavorText: "Hang on - we're rollin'!" - Bomber Twins
name: Yordle Contraption

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Inspection Passed!</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create a Inspection Passed! in hand.
flavorText: Wilfred was originally skeptical. He was skeptical throughout, too. In fact, he was skeptical 'til the very end - but Ziggs and the other hexplosive experts proved they knew how to put on a real humdinger of a fireworks show.
name: Safety Inspector

description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 3 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 3 to anything.
flavorText: "... turns out, HE was a huge hexplosives fan, too!" - Ziggs
name: Inspection Passed!

description: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
descriptionRaw: Set a unit's stats to 1|6 this round.
flavorText: The Bawkatrice is a loyal, steadfast mount under normal circumstances. However, when put under too much stress they are known to react in... unusual ways.
name: Stress Defense

description: Grant an ally +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +2|+0 and Impact.
flavorText: "If they ain't howlin', it ain't hot enough! Heh heh." - Rumble
name: Flamespitter

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon 2 attacking <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sand Soldiers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon 2 attacking Sand Soldiers.
flavorText: "Ya see? It gets everywhere! I DON'T LIKE SAND! The cleanup's gonna cost me a fortune!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Dunehopper Mech

description: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
descriptionRaw: Your opponent discards their lowest cost card.
flavorText:
"Note to self: On next expedition, keep all valuables in my FRONT pockets." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 19
name: Tricksy Tentacles

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText: "What's that, boy? Two of the recruits were scouting in the woods and stumbled across a scary grass monster, and now they might die a long and painful death? Lead the way!" - Teemo
name: Puffcap Pup

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Grant your <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> 1 extra damage.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Grant your Darkness everywhere 1 extra damage.
flavorText: Darkness comes in all shapes and sizes. Some of them SURPRISINGLY adorable.
name: Twisted Catalyzer

description: When I’m summoned, if you’ve added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+2.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, if you’ve added 2+ cards to your hand this round, grant me +1|+2.
flavorText: "Giantus grassicus. These terrifying creatures camouflage themselves by laying like ordinary grass and attack any unfortunate enough to walk over them. If encountered, run away forever!" - Ava Achiever
name: Yordle Newbie

description: When you summon another ally with equal or less Power than me, grant it +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally with equal or less Power than me, grant it +1|+1.
flavorText: "Adventuring means finding baddies, and turning them into friends!"
name: Yordle Captain

description: When I’m summoned, if you’ve summoned a <link=card.me><style=AssociatedCard>Thunder Fist</style></link> this game, transform me into <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Masa, Crashing Thunder</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, if you’ve summoned a Thunder Fist this game, transform me into Masa, Crashing Thunder.
flavorText: As Masa struck the training dummy, a flash of lightning erupted from the fist, splitting the wood in two and singeing the hair on his hands. He pulled on the rope, reeling in the bronze hand and reflecting on his training—he was finally ready. Suddenly, a monstrous roar echoed in the distance.
name: Thunder Fist

flavorText: "Nine hundred ninety-eight... nine hundred ninety-nine... one thousand! There we are, Bawky, you look impeccable as ever. Okay, now do mine!"
name: Pompous Cavalier

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant all allies with equal or less power than me +2|+2 and Impact.
flavorText: Power is a famously corrupting influence, but Poppy proves that its corruption is no match for a good heart and stubborn, steadfast obliviousness.
name: Poppy

description: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Poppy</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck. Create a Poppy in your deck.
flavorText: "And don't come back!" - Poppy
name: Poppy's Keeper's Verdict

description:
Costs 2 less if you have a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Tristana</style></link> or if you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw:
Costs 2 less if you have a Tristana or if you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions this game.
Deal 3 to a unit.
flavorText: In every ka-blam there's a ka-boom waiting to be born.
name: Buster Shot

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Grant the top 3 allies in your deck +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Grant the top 3 allies in your deck +1|+1.
flavorText: Mess with the mech, you get the horns.
name: Furyhorn Crasher

description: The first time you discard a card or damage the enemy Nexus, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time you discard a card or damage the enemy Nexus, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: "Alright, good fight. Good show everyone. Now clean up this crap, and uh, you know the drill: anything salvageable... fix it up, put it in the shop, and we'll just sell it right back to 'em! AHAHAHA!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Fix-Em-Uppers

description: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have 4+ allies, deal 2 instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to a unit. If you have 4+ allies, deal 2 instead.
flavorText: "Okay, this one's for the newsletter. And remember to smile this time! One... two... three...!" - Tristana
name: Group Shot

description: Give an ally +2|+0 and "<link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Recall me" this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 and "Round End: Recall me" this round.
flavorText: "Return to breath, and find your strength!" - Gust Monk
name: Cloud Stance

flavorText: The poros of yesteryear had much thicker heads than their contemporary kin, making them a little bit dumber, and a whole lot headbuttier.
name: Proto Poro

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prank</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Create a Prank in hand.
flavorText:
"Dear me, I've just had the oddest dream. One moment, I'm scrambling through the kelp, looking for my shell hat, when suddenly I hear the most wonderful melody. Next thing I know, I'm seated here, pen in hand, writing these words. I don't recall sitting down for a nap..."
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 22
name: Kelp Maidens

description:
To play me, discard a unit.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon an exact copy of the discarded unit.
descriptionRaw:
To play me, discard a unit.
Last Breath: Summon an exact copy of the discarded unit.
flavorText: "You thought I kept my money buried beneath the arena? HAH! What am I, a pirate? Now go fill that hole before the next match! ... ... Tim, we gotta move the money again." - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Lil Dipper

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a spell from your regions that costs 3 or less.
flavorText:
"Today is indeed a red letter day! An exploration into the deep! I expect things to proceed quite... swimmingly! Ho ho!" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 1
name: Conchologist

flavorText: Masa attacked with a loud cry. There was a sizzle, then a crack, followed by a howl. Enraged, The Aberration fixed its massive eye on the still-smoking bronze fists, unaware of the encroaching Stormcloud. Masa steeled himself as a monstrous hand fast-approached and prayed he'd bought them enough time.
name: Masa, Crashing Thunder

description: Transform a unit into a 3|3 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mini-Minitee</style></link> and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Transform a unit into a 3|3 Mini-Minitee and Silence it.
flavorText: "Oh-ho! How cute! How adorable! How TINY!" - Veigar
name: Minimorph

flavorText: "That hole you put in the ceiling during the last match? It's comin' outta your next paycheck!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Bouncer & Bolt

flavorText:
"...But one day he arrived, empty-handed,
And one by one, the greedy birds landed.
They pecked and scratched and mauled
'Til there was nothing left of him at all!"
- Bandle City tall tale
name: Hungry Owlcat

description: Costs 2 less if you've created 2+ cards this game. Draw 2.
descriptionRaw: Costs 2 less if you've created 2+ cards this game. Draw 2.
flavorText: Very few outsiders know the way to Bandle City, but strange markings in the rocks and trees of Runeterra offer hints to those who know what to look for.
name: Hidden Pathways

description: When I’m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, ALL players draw 1, then your opponent discards their highest cost card.
flavorText: "Worst. Trip. Ever." - Elle
name: Aloof Travelers

description:
When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Plant 3 <link=card.puffcap><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> on random cards in the enemy deck. 
Traps on enemy cards are doubled when activated.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned or Round End: Plant 3 Poison Puffcaps on random cards in the enemy deck. 
Traps on enemy cards are doubled when activated.
flavorText: "Rule 378: A good scout is always brave, always prepared, and always daring!"
name: Ava Achiever

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Tiny Spear</style></link> or a <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Tiny Shield</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Create a Tiny Spear or a Tiny Shield in hand.
flavorText: "My spear used to belong to a great hero, too... I made Poppy hold it for a minute!"
name: Yordle Squire

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Summon an attacking random 1 cost Poro.
flavorText: "An' den DAT Bobjim da poro was like "DAT WAY!" an' so off dey went into da horizahn, with da other poros scamperin' behind, tryin' their bestest to keep up!" - Ingvar the Younger
name: Poro Sled

flavorText: "There's a sucker born every minute, and I'm gonna take 'em for all they got... this mech arena's gonna be a GOLD MINE."
name: Arena Kingpin

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Prank</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Prank in hand.
flavorText:
"Curious and playful, the otterpus are an immensely cheery bunch. Or is it otterpi? Say, didn't I pack a third sandwich?" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 7
name: Otterpus

description: When you summon another ally, grant me +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant me +1|+0.
flavorText: "Small sparks become a raging blaze. We are the embers of your destruction!"
name: Ember Monk

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> 3 or when I'm destroyed: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm destroyed: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "It's a real work of art, isn't it!" - Giselle, Inventive Chemist
name: Scrappy Bomb

flavorText:
"Though quite small, the grumbleslug has a large appetite and possesses what I can only describe as a 'real attitude problem.'" 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 17
name: Grumbleslug

description: When I'm summoned, create a random landmark that costs 2 or less in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a random landmark that costs 2 or less in hand.
flavorText: The Fussyfoot Bomberator-X did precisely what it was meant to do: sow chaos. Plus, it was easy to parallel park.
name: Bomber Twins

flavorText: Now you see him. Now you don't. And now you're dead.
name: Shadowtech Walker

description: Deal 1 to anything. Draw 1.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to anything. Draw 1.
flavorText: The first rule of experimentation: poke it, and see what happens.
name: Pokey Stick

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. <style=Variable></style>
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me a random keyword for each allied landmark you've destroyed this game. 
When you destroy an allied landmark, grant me a random keyword.
flavorText: Wherever Ziggs went, Arnie followed, his serene demeanor a natural foil to Ziggs' chaotic zeal. His duties ranged from making sure the munitions were stocked, to putting out fires, to clapping his hands over Ziggs' ears when Ziggs (inevitably) forgot hearing protection.
name: The Arsenal

description:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 and a random keyword.
I keep these stat buffs and keywords when I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant me +1|+0 and a random keyword.
I keep these stat buffs and keywords when I'm Recalled.
flavorText: The Tornado maintains her calm with breathing exercises... and by channeling her inner turmoil into a vicious hurricane of deadly blades.
name: Tornado Warrior

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit with 3 or less Power.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit with 3 or less Power.
flavorText: "We are quick! We are the wind!" - Kennen
name: Quicken

description: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> an <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Otterpus</style></link> or one of 2 spells from your regions that cost 3 or less.
descriptionRaw: Manifest an Otterpus or one of 2 spells from your regions that cost 3 or less.
flavorText: "Unhand my sandwich this instant!" - Conchologist
name: Trinket Trade

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If it survives, <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If it survives, Stun it.
flavorText: "Move it!" - Poppy
name: Heroic Charge

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle and grant it <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle and grant it SpellShield.
flavorText: "Turn it down, will ya?! I care barely hear myself counting all this money!" - Karl, Arena Kingpin
name: Bilgerat Rascal

description: An ally <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> an enemy. If the ally is multi-region, it <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strikes</style></link> the enemy again.
descriptionRaw: An ally strikes an enemy. If the ally is multi-region, it strikes the enemy again.
flavorText: "The Acorn M1-85: a fully-automatic, oak caliber rifle with a bandlewood scope, and a purpleberry finish. Yeah, mama's cookin' up something good tonight!" - Bandle Commando
name: Double Tap

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Mecha-Yordle.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to Manifest a Mecha-Yordle.
flavorText: Small stature, BIG personality.
name: Squeaker

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>SpellShield</style></link> and +2|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally SpellShield and +2|+2 this round.
flavorText: Powered by gems mined from the caves beneath Bandle City, the Mechaforcer emits a defensive shield that can withstand even the strongest of weapons. It's pretty to look at too.
name: Geode Mechaforcer

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Hungry Owlcat</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Hungry Owlcat in hand.
flavorText:
"This is a song
About Poppy the strong!
Poppy the mightiest, frightiest... sprong!" 
- Scratched-out lyrics from the 'Songbook of Reginaldactyl and Faltimisquee, Bards Extraordinaire'
name: Babbling Balladeers

description: When I'm summoned, grant me <link=keyword.Impact><sprite name=Impact><style=Keyword>Impact</style></link> twice.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant me Impact twice.
flavorText:
"I didn't choose the smash life, the smash life chose ME!"
- Post-match interview
name: Smash & Dash

description:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a multi-region follower.
descriptionRaw:
Each round, the first multi-region unit you play costs 1 less.
Play: Manifest a multi-region follower.
flavorText: It's unclear whether Bandle City ever really elected a mayor, but an enormous mustache would almost certainly be a prerequisite.
name: Bandle City Mayor

description: Give allies +2|+2 this round. If you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions, give allies +4|+4 instead. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Give allies +2|+2 this round. If you've summoned or cast cards from 4+ regions, give allies +4|+4 instead.
flavorText: "We... look so cool right now." - Tristana
name: Yordles in Arms

description: Grant an ally +0|+1.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+1.
flavorText: "I found it! But you can use it!!" - Yordle Squire
name: Tiny Shield

description: Grant an ally +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+0.
flavorText: "A small spear is still a spear." - Yordle saying, probably
name: Tiny Spear

description: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Place an enemy unit on top of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "And don't come back!" - Poppy
name: Keeper's Verdict

description: Fill your hand with random cards. They cost 0 and are<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>. You can only play 3 more cards this round.
descriptionRaw: Fill your hand with random cards. They cost 0 and areFleeting. You can only play 3 more cards this round.
flavorText: One mortal's trash is another yordle's giant pile of scrap parts.
name: Treasured Trash

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: The mechs and yordles were bruised, battered, beaten. Then a clarion call sounded, granting them new steam, new life: Doot doot!
name: Trumpetecher

description: When I'm summoned, create 2 <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Pranks</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 2 Pranks in hand.
flavorText:
"Those who are prone to nausea should approach this gentle giant with EXTREME caution. Your insides will thank you... On a related note, I really shouldn't have eaten that second mushroom sandwich..." 
- Conchologist Ecological Entry, Day 3
name: Benemone

description: Deal 2 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Bouncing Bomb

description: Deal 1 to two enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to two enemies.
flavorText: "Fire in the hole!" - Ziggs
name: Bouncing Bomb

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
flavorText: "Yes, I'm quite sure the fellow up on the roof has many stories to tell. We all know he has lots to say. We just don't have any idea exactly WHAT it is he's saying." - Stilted Robemaker
name: Darkbulb Acolyte

flavorText: Oh, the wee minitee!
name: Mini-Minitee

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to create a multi-region follower in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to create a multi-region follower in hand.
flavorText: "Painting's not about copying what you see, it's about expressing how YOU see the world. And right now, I'm seeing that you moved again. Hold still please!"
name: Bandle Painter

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Give all allies with equal or less Power than me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Give all allies with equal or less Power than me Quick Attack this round.
flavorText: "Poppy never listens t'me, so you better: It's not about the hammer, it's about the yordle who swings it."
name: Yordle Smith

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a Celestial that costs 3 or less, Epic, or multi-region follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a Celestial that costs 3 or less, Epic, or multi-region follower.
flavorText: The strangest part wasn't that the telescope got up, stretched, and started walking around, but that it insisted on dressing for the weather, so it had to find a suitably comfortable scarf.
name: Loping Telescope

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to deal 2 to anything.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to deal 2 to anything.
flavorText: "First the crack, then the boom!" - Kennen
name: Lightning Rush

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Dart</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Attack: Create a Fleeting Poison Dart in hand.
flavorText: Don't get him started.
name: Lecturing Yordle

description: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of your <link=card.spell><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> by 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, reduce the cost of your Darkness everywhere by 1.
flavorText:
"It is important, when assembling one's cabal, that each maniacal member brings something unique to the supervillain table. One of my fellows, for instance, has a lethal sense of style..."
- Excerpt from Ch. 4 of "How to be a Supervillain", by Lord Veigar
name: Stilted Robemaker

description: When you summon another Yordle, grant it +1|+0.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another Yordle, grant it +1|+0.
flavorText: "Priceless is the glory of exploration, but the greatest discoveries are always... ahem... profitable."
name: Yordle Explorer

description: When you pick a non-champion card from randomly selected options, create a copy in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
descriptionRaw: When you pick a non-champion card from randomly selected options, create a copy in hand and reduce its cost by 1.
flavorText: Famously shy, the elusive shellfolk are known to hide in their shells until their curiosity gets the better of them. Once emerged, their playful personalities become fully engaged, including a propensity to play tricks by expertly mimicking the sound of other sea life.
name: Curious Shellfolk

description: Costs 2 less if you've <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> a unit this round.
descriptionRaw: Costs 2 less if you've Recalled a unit this round.
flavorText:
"Himon'she, it is an honor to travel with you. The others tell me you are wise beyond measure. Where are we heading?"
"Oh dear. I was following you!" - Ahri and the Pathless Ancient
name: Pathless Ancient

description: <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: The first time I <link=vocab.AttackStrike><style=Vocab>attack strike</style></link>, swap me with the ally to my right, then <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw: Attack: The first time I attack strike, swap me with the ally to my right, then Recall it.
flavorText: She searched for herself in other peoples' secrets. Saw herself through the eyes of so many. As she approached the forest, she wondered if it would be just another lens--or if, just this once, she'd found a mirror.
name: Ahri

description:
When you <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally, reduce its cost by 1.
<link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Each time I <link=vocab.AttackStrike><style=Vocab>attack strike</style></link>, swap me with the ally to my right, then <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> it.
descriptionRaw:
When you Recall an ally, reduce its cost by 1.
Attack: Each time I attack strike, swap me with the ally to my right, then Recall it.
flavorText: "I can remember a thousand memories I've never had. From now on, I'll make my own." - Ahri
name: Ahri

description:
<link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
Create an <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Ahri</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Recall an ally to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
Create an Ahri in your deck.
flavorText: "Tell me a secret." - Ahri
name: Ahri's Charm

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to give an enemy <link=keyword.Vulnerable><sprite name=Vulnerable><style=Keyword>Vulnerable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Recall an ally to give an enemy Vulnerable this round.
flavorText: "Tell me a secret." - Ahri
name: Charm

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: Play: Recall a unit.
flavorText: Chaos gives claws to the meek. A wolf hounds its prey and is stalled by a felled branch. A hawk dives and tumbles amidst a sudden gale. We are the branch. We are the wind.
name: Windsinger

description: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a unit.
descriptionRaw: Recall a unit.
flavorText: The wind moves all, in its own time.
name: Gust

description: When I'm summoned, draw 2 and give all other allies +1+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 2 and give all other allies +1+1 this round.
flavorText: The forest offers its secrets freely... but few bear the courage to ask questions of it.
name: Sai'nen Thousand-Tailed

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> an ally to summon an <nobr><link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it.</nobr>
<link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link><style=Variable></style>: Summon another <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> <nobr>copy of it.</nobr>
descriptionRaw:
Play: Recall an ally to summon an Ephemeral copy of it.
Countdown 3: Summon another Ephemeral copy of it.
flavorText: Once, the God-Willow grew within Omikayalan. What springs forth from that place now may be stronger, may be weaker. What matters is that it is new.
name: God-Willow Seedling

description: When I’m summoned, give me +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, give me +1|+0 and Elusive this round.
flavorText: "They say you don't speak to save others from the weight of your knowledge. Hmm... I bet you just got tired of answering questions." - Ahri
name: Woodland Keeper

description: Summon <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copies of the 3 <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> followers you've <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: Summon Ephemeral copies of the 3 strongest followers you've Recalled this game.
flavorText: Memories have fangs.
name: Children of the Forest

description: Each round, the first time you <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a follower, summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you Recall a follower, summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
flavorText: Mystery is a greater thing than its conclusion.
name: Tail-Cloak Matriarch

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Recall me.
flavorText: If one is to venerate the hunt, one must pause to weep for the hunted.
name: The Mourned

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Liminal Guardian</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Liminal Guardian.
flavorText: The forest needed a guardian, someone who could stand sentry at its borders for years, maybe centuries, without moving. Gai'sh was an eager volunteer and promptly proved his dedication with a ten-year nap.
name: Nine Lives

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower from your regions.
When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Nine Lives</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower from your regions.
When I'm Recalled, transform me into Nine Lives.
flavorText: "My best quality? I sleep like a rock."
name: Liminal Guardian

description: Pick an ally being targeted by enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> with only 1 target. Stop them.
descriptionRaw: Pick an ally being targeted by enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills with only 1 target. Stop them.
flavorText: An arrow knows neither the intent of the hunter, nor the worth of its prey.
name: Memory's Cloak

description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 1 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 1 to the weakest enemy.
levelupDescription: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.
flavorText:
"The two were once friends, but time and affinity made them into brothers. Certainly Azir could not have achieved all that he was able without Xerath by his side." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Xerath

description:
Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Xerath</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
Create a Xerath in your deck.
flavorText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath
name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Pitiful." - Xerath
name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Pitiful." - Xerath
name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 3 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 3 to the weakest enemy.
flavorText:
"If only Xerath had known that Azir planned to free him of his bondage, it might have prevented Shurima's demise... but some part of a mortal's humanity is lost when they Ascend, and any forgiveness or leniency was quickly erased from Xerath's mind." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Xerath

description:
When an allied landmark is destroyed or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 5 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy or the enemy Nexus if there are none.
If an enemy unit would die, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> it instead.
descriptionRaw:
When an allied landmark is destroyed or Round Start: Deal 5 to the weakest enemy or the enemy Nexus if there are none.
If an enemy unit would die, Obliterate it instead.
flavorText:
"For years he sowed seeds of revenge, plotting against Azir in the dark of the Emperor's Tomb. Xerath would see a new Shurima made in his own image, gathering the acolytes who had studied his arcane magics to serve as his army. Now, he marches on Shurima just as Azir has revived it." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Xerath

description: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions everywhere +2|+2 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: The Herald spread her arms wide as she lifted her face to the sun, which hung bloody and red above Shurima. "Hail, the Magus Ascendant," she breathed beatifically, her voice echoing off the ring of ruined columns. "Hail, Xerath!"
name: Herald of the Magus

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sarcophagus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Sarcophagus.
flavorText: As richly appointed as the tomb was, it did little good for the banished and the dead.
name: Endless Devout

flavorText: Xerath's new army would make better use of the tomb's many artifacts, turning useless extravagance into a powerful conduit for the Magus Ascendant's magic.
name: Restored Devout

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> 3 or when I'm destroyed: summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Restored Devout</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm destroyed: summon a Restored Devout.
flavorText: The Tomb of Emperors is no less lavish for serving as Xerath's prison. Indeed, the beauty of the place and its trappings is nothing if not a reminder of the inhabitants' fall from grace - a gilded prison.
name: Sarcophagus

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link> or when I'm summoned or destroyed: Grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm summoned or destroyed: Grant the strongest ally +2|+0.
flavorText: Sparking, crackling pillars rose from the sands, subverted places of power that would reinforce Xerath's already powerful army.
name: Obelisk of Power

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Destroy an allied landmark to grant allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Ruinous Acolytes</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Destroy an allied landmark to grant allied Ruinous Acolytes everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: All of Xerath's acolytes gave something of themselves in exchange for power, but his most powerful devotees were hardly more than husks of their former selves, serving as both conduit and power source for their new emperor's energy.
name: Ruinous Acolyte

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Stasis Statue</style></link> to store all allied units and landmarks that died or were destroyed this round inside.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Stasis Statue to store all allied units and landmarks that died or were destroyed this round inside.
flavorText: Magical energy does not dissipate. It is merely repurposed.
name: Servitude of Desolation

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link> 3 or when I'm destroyed: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dami'yin the Unbound</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm destroyed: Summon a Dami'yin the Unbound.
flavorText: "At each place of power shall an obelisk be raised, an instrument through which the Magus Ascendant may draw the power from beneath the sands." - Herald of the Magus
name: Risen Altar

flavorText: "At each place of power shall we draw forth the magical energy of the land, and in so doing, bolster our great emperor's armies!" - Herald of the Magus
name: Dami'yin the Unbound

description: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Ruinous Acolyte</style></link> or an <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Obelisk of Power</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Ruinous Acolyte or an Obelisk of Power in hand.
flavorText: "I will fashion Shurima in MY image." - Xerath
name: Construct of Desolation

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
flavorText: The horizon before her sang with energy. Where others saw sand and silt, she saw the ley lines, blinding lattices of pure energy that were hers for the taking.
name: Sandseer

description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round or destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 this round or destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
name: Unleashed Energy

description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 this round.
flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
name: Unleashed Energy

description: Destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
name: Unleashed Energy

description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When an allied landmark is destroyed, grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: The acolytes had been accomplished before they sought out Xerath. Now that they had studied what he had once studied himself, they were unstoppable.
name: Waste Walker

description: Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath
name: Rite of the Arcane

description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Pitiful." - Xerath
name: Rite of the Arcane

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Pitiful." - Xerath
name: Rite of the Arcane

description: When I'm summoned or discarded, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Twinblade Revenant</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or discarded, create a Twinblade Revenant in hand.
flavorText: The Demacians crawled to their ramparts to find death itself descending upon their walls. Though they were able to fell some of the Gray Legion, the dark tide of war soon proved unstoppable.
name: Lost Soul

description:
To play, discard 1.
When I'm discarded, summon an exact copy of me.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
When I'm discarded, summon an exact copy of me.
flavorText:
"We have an irregularity in our midst. Though most of those we revive abhor their return to life, this fellow seems to both understand his lot, and revels in the subsequent opportunities. Curious."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Reborn Grenadier

description: When I'm summoned, grant <link=keyword.Reckless><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Can't Block</style></link> to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
flavorText:
"It was the good Lady's suggestion that finally woke the creature. A small dose of iodine salt into the bloodstream, lethal to any mortal, but simply agonizing to our patient. To the risen, there is no greater motivator than pain."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Risen Reckoner

description: When I'm discarded, grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally +2|+0.
flavorText: As Lady Noradi's powers grew, she pondered whether her powers would take root in the corpses lining Noxus's oldest tombs. She found the light of life a mere flicker in the husks, but from those wilting flames, the shadows of war still danced.
name: Ancient Warmonger

description:
When I'm discarded, grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and place me into your deck.
I have +1|+0 for each card you've discarded this game (Max +7|+0).
descriptionRaw:
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
I have +1|+0 for each card you've discarded this game (Max +7|+0).
flavorText: Sion glimpsed fleeting flashes of opaque memories. Legions standing before him. Accolades. Crowns. War. A king's deathrattle. The Great Nothing. Blood. But just as soon as they floated by, they floated past, pale ribbons in the wind.
name: Sion

description:
To play, discard a card.
Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Reborn Grenadier</style></link> and give it +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard a card.
Summon a Reborn Grenadier and give it +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Rise again, my child..." - Dr. Esslanger, Pensive Physician
name: Salt And Stitches

description:
When I'm summoned, grant <link=keyword.Reckless><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Can't Block</style></link> to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Risen Reckoner</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
Last Breath: Create a Risen Reckoner in hand.
flavorText:
"The first minotaurs I revived were docile, useless beasts. Neither the thrum of war nor the threat of death could stir their senses."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Fallen Reckoner

description: When I'm discarded, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Risen Rider</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, create a Risen Rider in hand.
flavorText:
"It was only after rubbing the rider's armor with Blackshade leaves that they were spared from the basilisk's viciousness. The plants are native to the hinterlands, just as the beasts, and are as pungent as they are poisonous."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Fallen Rider

flavorText: "Upon the night, death rode." - The Lady of Blood
name: Risen Rider

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavorText:
"Though the fog lingers as we first wake Sion, the full spectrum of war stirs a life within him that is both furious and reluctant to end."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Sion Returned

description:
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Sion Returned</style></link>. 
When I'm discarded, grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and place me into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Last Breath: Summon Sion Returned. 
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
flavorText: Through the din of battle, he remembered. He remembered his life, a proud servant of Noxus. A revered general who gave his life felling Demacia's king. He remembered his death, and the empty expanse that followed. His was a good life, and a good death. But this... this was madness.
name: Sion

description:
To play, discard 1. Kill the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sion</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
Create a Sion in your deck.
flavorText: "Ally, enemy... I don't care." - Sion
name: Sion's Roar of the Slayer

description: To play, discard 1. Kill the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
flavorText: "Ally, enemy... I don't care." - Sion
name: Roar of the Slayer

description: Deal 3 to a unit and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Trifarian Shieldbreaker</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit and summon a Trifarian Shieldbreaker.
flavorText: "Shieldbreaker!" - Sion
name: Weapons of the Lost

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lost Soul</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a Lost Soul in hand.
flavorText:
"The Demacians palpably lost their will to fight upon seeing our fallen--who were so selflessly cut down by those brave Vanguard--rise once more. Victory was never in question."
- Excerpt from the Lady of Blood's field report, recipient unknown
name: Twinblade Revenant

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to draw a unit.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to draw a unit.
flavorText: Dr. Esslanger was once a respected and retiring physician who garnered his credible reputation through years of hard work. But it wasn't until a young noblewoman was brought to his study, her blood blackened by betrayal, that he truly began serving Noxus.
name: Grave Physician

description: When a non-<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> ally in hand is discarded, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: When a non-Fleeting ally in hand is discarded, create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Under cover of night, Lady Faris Noradi led her Gray Legion out of the Noxian capital. It took three hard, bloody weeks, but they finally neared the small Demacian outpost her scouts had identified. It was time for the demonstration.
name: The Lady of Blood

description: Grant me +2|+1 once you've discarded 3+ cards this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+1 once you've discarded 3+ cards this game.
flavorText: "What could better instill loyalty in a would-be traitor than the sight of a butchered conspirator, brought back to fight under the Noxian banner? They will all serve, one way or another." - The Lady of Blood
name: Noble Rebel

description: When you cast a spell, grant +1|+0 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> other ally that isn't <link=keyword.Immobile><sprite name=Immobile><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Immobile</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant +1|+0 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
levelupDescription: You've gained 8+ spell mana this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've gained 8+ spell mana this game.
flavorText:
"Have you said your goodbyes, young Tidecaller?"
"Yes, greatmother."
"Are you afraid?"
"...Yes, greatmother."
"Good. To be afraid is to be cautious. But trust yourself, as we trust you. Now, go. And may the currents keep you."
name: Nami

description:
Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flow</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nami</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
Create a Nami in your deck.
flavorText: "Heed the tide's temper..." - Nami
name: Nami's Ebb

description: When you cast a spell, grant +2|+1 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> other ally that isn't <link=keyword.Immobile><sprite name=Immobile><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Immobile</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, grant +2|+1 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
flavorText:
"Do you think she's far along in her journey?"
"We can only hope, Tama."
"I can see her now... Beautiful eyes glowing in the light of the moon, the shine of saltwater glistening on her scales."
"This burden... the fate of our people. It should not be hers alone."
"She is doing her part, as we are doing ours, Loto. All we can do is believe in her, and love her with all our hearts."
name: Nami

description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flow</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
flavorText: "Heed the tide's temper..." - Nami
name: Ebb

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2, and create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ebb and Flow</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2, and create an Ebb and Flow in hand.
flavorText: "...And cherish the swell's calm." - Nami
name: Flow

description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and heal an ally or your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and heal an ally or your Nexus 2.
flavorText: "I decide what the tide will bring." - Nami
name: Ebb and Flow

flavorText: "Sure, a few of 'em hunt us, like they hunt everything. But y'know, most landwalkers I meet are just looking to enjoy their time in the big blue, same as us. We're all just people."
name: Journeying Sandhopper

description: When you cast a spell, give me +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you cast a spell, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Many of our tribe find Loto somewhat unnerving. They see only a tireless fighter, and the distance in his troubled gaze. But I know what's truly in his heart--fear that he is not strong enough to save us... and extraordinary love." - Tama, Marai Songstress
name: Abyssal Guard

description: For every 2 spells you cast in a round, grant other allies +1|+1.<style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: For every 2 spells you cast in a round, grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "LISTEN HERE, SOWDIER. I'LL HAVE YOU KNOW I HAVE OVA FWEE-HUNDWED CONFIRMED KWILLS AND I'M DA TOP ADMIWAL IN ALL DA MAWINE'S FORCES SO WHEN I SAY SWIM, YOU BETTA SWIM, OKAY? OKAY THANK YOU!"
name: Fleet Admiral Shelly

description: Deal 1 to two different randomly targeted enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crashing Wave</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to two different randomly targeted enemies and create a Crashing Wave in your deck.
flavorText: "Oceans spill forth!" - Nami
name: Tidal Wave

description: Deal 2 to four different randomly targeted enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Colossal Wave</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to four different randomly targeted enemies and create a Colossal Wave in your deck.
flavorText: "Roiling seas engulf them!" - Nami
name: Crashing Wave

description: Deal 4 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Rolling tides, heed my call!" - Nami
name: Colossal Wave

description:
If you would get a mana gem, instead refill your spell mana.
When you cast a spell, create in hand a random spell that costs 3 or less and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
If you would get a mana gem, instead refill your spell mana.
When you cast a spell, create in hand a random spell that costs 3 or less and give it Fleeting.
flavorText: To the Marai, the Leo'lei is a herald of great change. It is said each flourish of its graceful wings influences the flow of the tides.
name: Avatar of the Tides

description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText: The Marai rarely desire to venture far from home. But Ai'la was born with curiosity in her heart--and though she is bound by duty to her tribe, she spends each waking moment dreaming of the day she can truly be free.
name: Marai Warden

description: When I'm summoned, create 5 random 6+ cost spells in your deck and lower their cost to 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 5 random 6+ cost spells in your deck and lower their cost to 3.
flavorText: The Marai's ancestral home is protected by the celestial light of a moonstone. Every hundred years, its light begins to wane, and a new Tidecaller is tasked with finding another--for without it, the Marai people would be plunged into darkness, and fall prey to the horrors that lurk in the depths.
name: Marai Greatmother

description: When I'm summoned, if you've cast a spell this round, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've cast a spell this round, grant me Elusive.
flavorText:
"The ocean believes that the wave will return,
gives trust to the ebb, to the flow, to the churn.
So 'ere the wave crashes against the shore, 
the ocean delights in the crest's bold roar."
- A verse from 'Serenade for the Tidecaller'
name: Marai Songstress

description: Whenever your opponent draws, plant 1 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Trap</style></link> randomly in the top 10 cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Whenever your opponent draws, plant 1 Flashbomb Trap randomly in the top 10 cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText:
"Officer was witnessed pursuing suspect at a high speed into a trap of her own making. Following the arrest, officer proceeded to submit her own speeding citation and fine, claiming (somewhat dramatically) 'Justice is a two-way street.'" 
- Excerpt from a Warden beat report
name: Justice Rider
